attributes.action: Phv drivers licensed by Tfl should show individual license number on the vehicle
attributes.additional_details: The system is already in place for Black cabs so it wouldn’t be a great change or increase of workload for Tfl to include this for the Phv sector . Whom at present only show the rondel which in many  cases isn’t visible due to tinted windows and rondel placement . The drivers should be as accountable as other customer transport services in the capital . This would be clearer to customers using ride share apps whose vehicle they are getting into and hopefully increase the diligence of drivers .
attributes.background: Phv drivers operating with Tfl license should show identifiers in the same way Hackney Carriages ( Black cabs ) do to improve the accountability of those working within the Tfl network

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about driver licences for PHVs are a matter for TfL, not the UK Government or Parliament.
